ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron turned to the banging door and told Kitkat to open it. The screams sounded like star screams....but it couldnt be, could it? Paralysis looks to Atma,

    Megatron turned to the banging door and told Kitkat to open it. The 
screams sounded like star screams....but it couldnt be, could it?

    Paralysis looks to Atma, "You guys should come to the bunker. We need all 
the fire power we can get over here."

    Aracnia looks back at Quickstrikeas they leave. "I know he likes me. But 
I dont think I could ever have time for a relationship. Predacon Commander is 
quite time consuming."

    Tarantulas ghasps as he reads the final lines to the journal of the 
Aliens..."Black Aracnia! Get over here NOW! WE HAVE TROBLE!"
